title: 279. Andy & DJ CTI: Judge Strikes Down Mask Mandate, Ron DeSantis Threatens Twitter & Easter Bunny Stops Biden
itunes:title: 279. Andy & DJ CTI: Judge Strikes Down Mask Mandate, Ron DeSantis Threatens Twitter & Easter Bunny Stops Biden
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss TSA's announcement that it will not enforce Biden's mask mandate in airports after a judge declared mandates illegal on federal airplanes, Ron DeSantis threatening Twitter for blocking Elon Musks' takeover, and a staffer dressed up as an Easter Bunny stopping President Biden from answering a reporter's question.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss TSA's announcement that it will not enforce Biden's mask mandate in airports after a judge declared mandates illegal on federal airplanes, Ron DeSantis threatening Twitter for blocking Elon Musks' takeover, and a staffer dressed up as an Easter Bunny stopping President Biden from answering a reporter's question.
